text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Murmur, murmur…

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: I really wanted McQueen to win today…

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
I've been camping on this spot for a whole week just to see her get 
her third win with my own eyes.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Rice…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eheheh… They're all disappointed.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I heard there was a sight you wanted me to see, but all I see is a 
repeat of the Kikuka Sho…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I mean, I knew this would happen, but… still, it… it hurts.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
…When I was disqualified in the autumn Tenno Sho, I felt much the 
same way.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Knowing I'd betrayed the hopes of so many, I found it difficult to 
carry on.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: But then, I saw it—the sight I speak of.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The sight…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm sure you'll see it too. Come on, now. We're up.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh? …Ah!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Murmur, murmur…

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Look, it's Rice Shower! Why'd you have to deny her third win, huh?!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: We came here to see McQueen win!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Dammit, we gotta drown them out! Good going, Rice! You're the best!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Congratulations, Rice!

text_block_list.name: Fan C
text_block_list.text: You… you ran well.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ayy! You get it! Now gimme one more, in a voice she can hear this 
time!

text_block_list.name: Fan C
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! O-okay! 
You ran well!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: There are people cheering… for me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: And this is the sight only a victor can see.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Those who placed their hopes in you, those who had their hopes 
dashed… Standing here, you can see all their faces.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
To take all those emotions in—the good and the bad—is the duty of a 
victor, and also her pride.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: A victor's duty… and pride…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
For the fans who put even the slightest of hopes in you… And for the 
fans who hoped against you… For all their sakes, stand tall.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Now, time to show them what a true victor looks like.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Okay!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
All the people disappointed that I won—they'll be even more 
disappointed if I don't look like I belong up here.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I need to stand tall—look them all in the eye, and show them that I'll 
keep on running…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Until one day, I become an Umamusume they'll be happy to see win!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I have high hopes for you, Rice.

The concert begins, marking not only Rice's victory but also 
McQueen's crushing defeat.

And yet, Rice sings with far more spirit than she did after the Kikuka 
Sho.
McQueen, you did well out there.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It seems like Rice has noticed what she's been lacking this entire time.
I could tell from her singing.
I could tell from her singing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Gosh, what a disgrace for me though. I was the one who asked you to 
enter her in the race, and here I am defeated.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: She really did… perform wonderfully.
She's not exaggerating. Rice ran better than I've ever seen her run.

But the same goes for McQueen. I could feel how much she wanted 
her third title.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …Sob.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I was just one step away… I wanted to win!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Sob. Trainer!

She ran with a lot on her shoulders today. The weight of her ambition. 
Her duties as team ace. And I have nothing but gratitude for her 
efforts.
Rice Shower must see that too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The witch had nobody to turn to. But one day, a boy came to visit 
her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: "I want to soar across the sky like a bird."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The witch gladly cast a spell on the boy, and he smiled, for his wish 
had come true. "Wow! This is incredible!"

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: After seeing that, the others started to visit the witch too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Some were still scared, but day by day, more and more people began 
to smile.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The witch wanted to make everyone happy, so she cast spell after 
spell, sparing none of her power.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But one day, she suddenly became unable to use magic.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Using so much had tired her out, and she collapsed from exhaustion.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Everyone who had once feared the witch then realized how hard she 
had worked to make them happy.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Now that they knew her true feelings, they began to care for her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
They all eagerly awaited the day she would become healthy enough 
to use magic again.
